column4: I'm using the latest kubuntu.  Is there anything that I need to do in orer to get cd recording to work?
use k3b (or install it if not yet available)
it complained about not having cdrdao, I installed that, but k3b can't see the drive.
cdrecord also fails.  I'm calling it by cdrecord dev=/dev/hdc and it seems like cdrecord locks up
